long_desc.thetext:
I just opened the branch list of the qooxdoo repo and saw some old branches in there which could be deleted. So I thought opening up a bug for that sounds like a good idea. So here is a list of branches.
default qooxdoo branches (MW) ------------------------------------- master branch_4_1_x branch_4_0_x branch_3_5_x branch_3_0_x branch_2_1_x
Branches to delete ----------------------
- pr/117 (TO) - next (MW) - qWidget (MW) - qmobile (MW) - responsiveTabs (DW)
Other branches ------------------ rs_leaner_env transform3d cmd qooxdoo-calendar baseLibFix scss resolution widget qxWebMobile points jqx
Please check and let me know if you need any of the other branches and whats you plan of getting those changes into master.

Removed mine: $ git push origin --delete rs_leaner_env $ git push origin --delete rs_restmodule
---------
"resolution" branch seems to be merged already. $ git branch --merged * master resolution svgimgsize
---------
Note: There are some branches missing here which GitHub lists (e.g. "commandmanager"). Why?

Removed the following branches:
testrunner_push qooxdoo-calendar qmobile widget pr/117 scss qxWebMobile qWidget resolution responsiveTabs points.js next baseLibFix
Still waiting for feedback on:
cmd commandmanager ms_test transform3d

Removed those 4 branches as well:
cmd commandmanager ms_test transform3d
Now we only have a couple of branches left which seems to be ok without and old and unused stuff.
